name: Garden Bots (MangoWorks)
description: Welcome To Camp Garden Bots! In this summer camp you will have to guide robot to collecting resources and using cards to survive!   How to play: 1. Click on robots to open up there panel Then click on the resource you want them to collect! 2. Right click on the robot if you want to feed it 1 of every resource. 3. At the end of the day you will get 2 cards but you can only pick 1 of the cards. 4. make sure your robots don't die they lose hp every turn feed them to keep hem alive 5. If you have 3 robots alive or less then you lose! 6.Use arrow keys/WASD to move the camera so you can look for stuff Cards: Dice Card - Right click it to destroy it and it adds random number 1 - 12 to each resource. Devils Deal - If you lose the devil will give you a second chance but he will destroy all you cards. Gods Goods - On the start of a new day God will give you a free random card but take away 5 wood from you Classroom - When you get this card your robots will move 50% faster but the timer will go down by 5s Factory - Adds 1 robot each day for 5 wood Lumber Yield - Each robot make 1 wood at the end of the day   Bomb - Blows up robots and gets 1 of everything for each robot it destroys  Leg of Luck - If food is your most grabbed thing you get to respin if you don't like your options and then destroys itself Rate the game here: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022/rate/1623886 Jam Version: https://mangoworks.itch.io/garden-bots
